pkgmetadata.longdescription: adesklets is an interactive Imlib2 console for the X Window system. It provides scripted languages with a clean and simple way to write great looking, mildly interactive desktop integrated graphic applets (aka desklets). It can also be used as a command line oriented graphic editor, a bit similar to ImageMagick , but with different functionality.

use.flag: force CTRL to be pressed to fire context menu
